description: Accellion Kiteworks renewal SSC Accellion Kiteworks renewal- Amendment 000
full_summary:
=====================


### Accellion Kiteworks Renewal

**Public Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023867


**Publication Date:** September 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 29, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Time)


**Contracting Authority:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)

**Location of Performance:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contract Description:** Accellion Kiteworks renewal for Shared Services Canada (SSC).


### Notice Document

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued by SSC to seek bids for the Accellion Kiteworks renewal. This opportunity is open to all qualified contractors. The RFP document is available for download at the link below:

_ [Insert attachment link] _

### Eligibility Requirements

All interested vendors must possess a minimum of General Services Industry Classification (GSIN) code N7030AG. Applicants are required to be suitably qualified to perform the services described in the RFP documentation.

### Submission Requirements

Vendors must submit their proposals in accordance with the requirements outlined in the RFP document. Proposals must be received by SSC at the designated closing date and time.

### Contact Information

For technical questions related to this RFP, please contact:

Gary Presley
Business Analyst
Shared Services Canada
Phone: (613) 617-0580
Email: gary.presley @ ssc-spc.gc.ca
Fax: (613) 960-6007

### Notice Documents and Attachments

The RFP document can be downloaded from the link provided. No notice URL is available.

Submission of Proposals
------------------------

All interested parties are invited to submit a proposal to SSC. Any questions or inquiries related to the RFP should be directed to the designated contact as stated in the above section. Proposals must meet the eligibility requirements as stipulated in the RFP documentation. SSC reserves the right to cancel the RFP without prejudice to any contractual rights in effect at the time of cancellation. Submission of proposals to SSC will be subject to compliance with all applicable statutes and regulations.

---

Note: All relevant information has been preserved and only minor changes were made to improve readability and concision.

Formatting:
- Subheadings have been maintained for separation of information
- Bullet points have been eliminated
- One bullet point in original text related to regions of delivery has a duplicate specific country name at a later point. It has been retained for brevity
